alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:53AM CDT until June 05 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL ALFALFA...SOUTHWESTERN GRANT AND NORTHWESTERN GARFIELD COUNTIES... At 653 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Nash, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pond Creek, Jet, Nash, Hillsdale and Jefferson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
